page.title: 07PLANTOME NURSERIES
page.content: Plantome Nurseries is situated on the old Woodham road. It covers an area of approximately one hectare. The buildings on the site are one large glasshouse used as the shop area, and four plastic tunnels. The nursery is retail only, buying in the large majority of its stock mostly from Holland, but some plants come from as far away as New Zealand.They sell over 1000 varieties of vegetables and 50 different conifers and 50 types of broad-leafed trees. In the shop they sell a large selection of gardening tools, fertilisers and tender plants. They sell a range of garden ornaments, many of which come from China. They provide employment for 5 fulltime workers plus a seasonal variation in part-time employees. The nursery has been in existance for 25 years under the same ownership.
